code

Class Classifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • code.Classifier

  • public class Classifier
extends java.lang.Object
    CS39440 Major Project: Learning From Experience Classifier.java Purpose: Initiates the start of the program by instructing the decision tree to be built by the tree builder class, using data read in from the file reader class. This class then uses the built tree to perform classification and pruning.
    Version:
    2.0 29/04/16
    Author:
    Ben Larking

      Classifier()

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calcIncorrectlyPlaced(code.Node child, code.Instance instance)
      Method required to find out how many instances are incorrectly classified on a node.
      void cleanPath(code.Node node)
      If a node and a leaf node have the same amount of instances the leaf node can be removed and the parent node turned into a leaf node.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void prune(code.Node node)
      Initiates tree pruning and tree clean up.
      void pruneTree(code.Node node)
      Pruning a decision node consists of removing subtree rooted at that node, making it a leaf node, and assigning it the most common classification of the training examples associated with that node.
      void removeClassifiedData(code.Node node)
      Removes all test data from nodes on the tree from the point of the node past into the method.

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • prune

        public void prune(code.Node node)
        Initiates tree pruning and tree clean up.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to be pruned.

      • pruneTree

        public void pruneTree(code.Node node)
        Pruning a decision node consists of removing subtree rooted at that node, making it a leaf node, and assigning it the most common classification of the training examples associated with that node.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to be pruned from.

      • cleanPath

        public void cleanPath(code.Node node)
        If a node and a leaf node have the same amount of instances the leaf node can be removed and the parent node turned into a leaf node.
        Parameters:
        node - The node from which the downstream path should be cleaned.

      • removeClassifiedData

        public void removeClassifiedData(code.Node node)
        Removes all test data from nodes on the tree from the point of the node past into the method.
        Parameters:
        node - The node from which all test data will be removed.

      • calcIncorrectlyPlaced

        public void calcIncorrectlyPlaced(code.Node child,
                                  code.Instance instance)
        Method required to find out how many instances are incorrectly classified on a node.
        Parameters:
        child - The node that will have the amount of incorrectly classified test data assigned to it counted.
        instance - The instance to be compared against the rest of the instances in a node.
